title: [GAMEPLAY] Visual bug on Haunted Zyra
body: Whenever I play Haunted Zyra after ten, fifteen, to twenty minutes into the match, I get weird polygons flashing from my seeds and character model, and my screen flashes white, it's extremely obnoxious. It doesn't happen with any other champion I play or any other Zyra skin, only Haunted Zyra.

replies.body:
Hi hi! 

As Dunkin Darius said, you may need to do a client repair. You can do so by: 

* Open the League of Legends Launcher.
* Click the Gear button to open the Settings menu.
* Click the "Repair" button. The repair process will take about 30-60 minutes.

If you're still having this issue, lemme know! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
